game.name: The King of Assassins - The Kingdom
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 난이도 조정, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An action RPG combat game featuring two gameplay modes: Story Mode and Arena Mode. Engage in battles against enemies, bosses, and their allies, complete challenging missions, face relentless waves and storms of adversaries, and undertake various challenges to reclaim your kingdom. Enjoy! the game
game.shortDescriptionEn: An action RPG combat game featuring two gameplay modes: Story Mode and Arena Mode. Engage in battles against enemies, bosses, and their allies, complete challenging missions, face relentless waves and storms of adversaries, and undertake various challenges to reclaim your kingdom. Enjoy! the game
game.developers: Faith Studio Team, Rabie Mounther Haddad
